mapper.select: select content_id,content_name, learning_difficulty, learning_member, TO_CHAR(price, '9,999,999') as price, sale ||'%' as sale, to_char((price - (price * (sale / 100))),'9,999,999') as real_price, learning_content from content where 1=1

select s.content_id ,c.CONTENT_NAME, c.LEARNING_MEMBER, TO_CHAR(c.price, '9,999,999') as price, to_char((c.price - (c.price * (c.sale / 100))),'9,999,999') as real_price, c.LEARNING_DIFFICULTY, c.LEARNING_CONTENT, to_char(s.subscription_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as subscription_date,s.paystatus from content c, subscription s where c.content_id = s.content_id and s.user_id = #{user_id} order by s.subscription_date DESC

select l.content_id, c.content_name, g.group_name,l.learner_name , to_char(l.group_appdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as group_appdate, s.TOTAL_PERSONNEL, s.current_personnel, l.groupyn, s.user_id, l.user_id_learner, g.group_id from learner_group l, content c, SUBSCRIPTION s, groups g where c.content_id = l.content_id and s.content_id = l.content_id and g.group_id = l.group_id and s.user_id = #{user_id}
select distinct content_id, content_name from subscription where user_id = #{user_id} order by content_id asc

select distinct g.user_id_leader ,g.content_id, g.group_name, s.content_name, s.total_personnel, s.current_personnel, g.group_id from subscription s, groups g where g.content_id = s.content_id and g.user_id_leader = #{user_id}
mapper.insert:
select 'G' || LPAD(SEQ_groups.NEXTVAL, 4, '0') from dual
insert into groups values(#{group_id}, #{user_id_leader}, #{content_id},#{group_name}, #{group_personnel},#{learning_start} ,#{learning_end})
insert into subscription select #{user_id}, content_id, content_name, sysdate, (price - (sale* price)) as real_price, LEARNING_MEMBER, 0,'Y' from content where content_id = #{content_id}
mapper.update: update subscription set paystatus = 'C' where content_id = #{content_id }
mapper.insert: insert into sales (SUBSCRIPTION_DATE, CONTENT_ID, TRANSACTION_COUNT, SALES) (select sysdate, content_id, '1', (price - (price * sale)) from content where content_id = #{content_id})

select 'H' || LPAD(SEQ_HOMEWORK.NEXTVAL, 4, '0') from dual
insert into homework select #{homework_no}, #{group_id}, #{content_id}, #{user_id_leader}, #{user_id_learner} ,#{homework_deadline}, #{homework_content_leader}, '','','' from learner_group
